import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { i_bell } from '../../../images' import Avatar from '../../../images/photos' import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' const List = () =>{ // state = { // } React.useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:5024/contacts?id=2').then((res) => { console.log(res, 'ini datanya') /* setStatus(res.status) setData(res.data) */ }).catch((err) => { console.log(err.message) }) }) const data =[ { username : 'Theresa Webb' , photo : Avatar.photo3, time : '15:20', newMessage :Why did you do that?, icon : , count : 2, id :1 }, { username : 'Brother' , photo : Avatar.photo4, time : 'Yesterday', newMessage : Ok. Good bye!, icon : null, count : null, id:2 }, { username : 'Theresa Webb' , photo : Avatar.photo5, time : '15:20', newMessage : Hi, bro! Come to my house!, icon : null, count : 1, id:3 }, { username : 'Theresa Webb' , photo : Avatar.photo6, time : '15:20', newMessage : Me: Bro, just fuck off, icon : null, count : null, id:4 }, { username : 'Mother ❤' , photo : Avatar.photo7, time : '15:20', newMessage : Me: Yes, of course come, ..., count : null, icon : null, id:5 }, ] return(
{data.map((element)=>(
{element.username} {element.icon}
{element.time}
{element.newMessage}
{element.count}
) )}
) } export default List
